UnifiedEmail.name: UnifiedEmail
UnifiedEmail.description: Represents an email that was captured or synced from an EmailMessage or Task record.

ActivityDateTime.description: The date and time of the email in the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time zone.

DetailId.description: The ID of the object that contains detailed activity-specific information. The object depends on the activity type. For example, the detail for a Task activity is a Task object. The detail for an Event activity is an Event object. If the email was captured from Einstein Activity Capture, this field returns a blank value.

Direction.description: The direction in which the email was sent or received.

IsInsightAvailable.description: Indicates whether the activity has an insight associated with it (true) or not (false).

IsPrivate.description: Indicates whether the activity's sensitive fields (Subject and Snippet) are masked (true) or visible (false) for non-owners.

Snippet.description: An abbreviation of the email content. This field has a maximum length of 255 characters.

Subject.description: Contains the subject of the email.
